pages.title: Kamen Rider Dark Necrom Pink
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ghost (2015, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:ghost/devices/proto_mega_ulorder_pink)Proto Mega Ulorder (Dark Necrom Pink)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Ghost Driver or Mega Ulorder user$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed II$(li)Resistance$(li)Strength II
